changeSet.author: joao
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ASSOCIADO ( ID_ASSOCIADO BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, ID_REUNIAO BIGINT, ID_VOTACAO BIGINT, ID_ACESSO BIGINT, ID_PESSOA BIGINT, STATUS_ASSOCIADO VARCHAR(25), DATA_ADMISSAO DATE, PADRINHO VARCHAR(50), HISTORICO VARCHAR(2000), PRIMARY KEY (ID_ASSOCIADO), FOREIGN KEY (ID_ACESSO) REFERENCES ACESSO(ID_ACESSO) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (ID_PESSOA) REFERENCES PESSOA(ID_PESSOA) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (ID_REUNIAO) REFERENCES REUNIAO(ID_REUNIAO) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (ID_VOTACAO) REFERENCES VOTACAO(ID_VOTACAO) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE );
